name: Sacred (itch) (jadim)
description:
A short visual novel game made in RPG maker, in which you walk through life in the Cult of The New Order.

Very short game, like 15 minutes if you're pushing it, with 5 endings along with a bonus secret ending (it's not that difficult to find if you play through the whole game)

Read the warnings at the beginning of the game please and thank you

If you ask why the music is so low it's because it sucks and I know it I'm not a good composer

This was made in two days over the span of 12 hours(ish?) everything by me other than the game engine obviously. Don't expect greatness as I am one 15 year old man i can only do so much

go follow my Twitter and check out my Toyhou.se for more info on the main character (includes spoilers so like play the game first pls) and also follow my Tiktok

sorry to my mac os users at the moment. I'm trying to figure out how to upload it for you
